failure.message: Failed to satisfy email query for inbox ID `f15e636d-055b-4b13-a895-c7ec7dbb8dbb` for user ID `eeaa851d-e8cf-4fa1-98f2-9ea06b63780d`. Expected minimum message count of `1`. Found at most `0`(after max timeout of `30000 ms` and a back-off period of `1000 ms`). Did you send an email to the inbox? The inbox's email address is `f15e636d-055b-4b13-a895-c7ec7dbb8dbb@mailslurp.com`. Sort direction `ASC`, unread only `false`, match options `null`, created at after `2000-01-01T00:00:00Z` and created at before `3000-01-01T00:00:00Z`
